provide_your_profile: Provide your profile details to get started with your health monitoring journey

to_begin_your_health: To begin your health journey link your Doori Healthable device
permission_required_content: Permission to access your Location feature for Doori App to scan and connect to your Doori Device. Android requires this to be able to scan for near by Bluetooth Low Energy devices. So be assure, the Doori App will never read, store & share your location data.

your_account_data_will_be: Your account data will be permanently deleted and your account will be deleted.

to_get_insightful_details_about_your_hea: To get insightful details about your health keep measuring regularly.

place_your_finger_on_the_sensor: Place your finger on the sensor and make sure it is covered completely.
be_steady_while_taking_the_reading: Be steady while taking the reading. Make sure you are rested.
calibration_completed: Calibration completed. Keep your finger steady to get a quick measurement.
connection_failed: Connection Failed. Please make sure device is near by and try again.
device_is_disconnected: Device is disconnected.\nDo you want to retry the measurement process or cancel it?
what_were_you_doing_before: What were you doing before you started measuring?

the_walls_of_both_your_right_and_left_af: The walls of both your right and left ventricles may be at risk of being affected.
the_walls_of_both_your_right_and_left_su: The walls of both the right and left ventricles, along with the pulmonary and aortic valves, may be susceptible to damage.
when_a_person_experiences_a_hypertensive: When a person experiences a Hypertensive Crisis (Emergency), their heart and overall health are facing a severe and potentially life-threatening situation. A Hypertensive Crisis is characterized by extremely high blood pressure readings. In a hypertensive crisis, the person's heart is under significant stress, and there is an urgent need for medical attention.
hypotension_is_a_condition_characterized: Hypotension is a condition characterized by abnormally low blood pressure. When a person has hypotension, their heart and overall health may face several potential challenges and symptoms. It's important to note that not all cases of hypotension are the same, and the effects on the heart and body can vary based on the underlying cause and the severity of the condition.
often_referred_to_as_hypotensive_shock_o: Often referred to as hypotensive shock or shock due to extremely low blood pressure, is a medical emergency that places significant stress on the heart and the entire circulatory system. In cases of severe hypotension, the person's heart and overall health are facing critical challenges, and immediate medical intervention is essential.
